transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, ha ji.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir, Prabhat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se senior manager.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ji sir, main keh raha tha aapka profile chala tha sir IndiaMART pe Inside Infratech ke naam se sir. To iske regarding maine aapko call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Ji, ji sir, kya tha aapka sir discussion chal raha tha Ankita ji se bhi sir. To sir kya issue aa raha hai bataiye sir isme humne enrichment vagaira bhi profile par karaya hai. Catalog score bhi abhi improve kara diya sir.
Customer: Issue bas itna hi hai ki koi hame beneficial leads nahi aa rahi hai aur jo kuch aa rahi hai wo fake aa rahi hai jaise regarding jobs wo naukri ke liye calls aa rahi hain.
Customer: Bas yahi hai.
Executive: Naukri vagaira ke liye.
Customer: Haan aur kuch jo leads bhi aa rahi hai wo bhi bahut chhoti chhoti aa rahi hai hume minimum criteria 5000 square feet area ka chahiye minimum.
Executive: Dekhiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Dekhiye sir quantity ka to main sir bahut kuch nahi kar sakta hu quantity mein to sir ye hoga bulk ka filter hi lagaiye lekin jo naukri agar uske relevant lead aati uska maine theek karwa diya hai abhi usme kya tha sir ki kabhi kabhi kya hota hai na ki koi customer koi product ki aap lead kharidte ho.
Customer: Main wahi hai main to naukri wale hi hai matlab ek almost daily aata hai us tarah ka.
Executive: Inside Infratech mein na.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Industrial aapka to yahi kaam hai na industrial trade sector.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Isme dekhiye calls ka sir nahi but buylead to abhi jo current mein jo aa rahi hai wo aapko uski nahi dikhegi job wala wo agar aapko aata hai to mujhe ek baar is number main aapko whatsapp kar raha hu us number mujhe report kijiye.
Customer: Nahi buylead nahi milti hai uske uske regarding calls aati hain.
Executive: Calls to sir dekhiye kya hota hai ki kabhi kabhi sir customer pata nahi kahan se dhund ke kar leta hai calls to main nahi sir calls aapke paas to call hi nahi aayegi. Calls kitni aayi aapke paas? Ye aisa kar sakte ho aap suniye jab aap call wala se baat karne ke jo call aayega to ek do number hash aur one press kar diya kijiye block ho jayega fir us number pe us type ki call bhi aani band ho jayegi ek to practice aise kijiye.
Customer: Hash aur hash aur one?
Executive: Haan baat karte the hash one press kar dijiye theek hai. Aur wo mujhe immediate report kijiye Prabhat ji ek aap whatsapp par mujhe ki ek number se call aaya tha naukri ke liye tha. To aisa do char din hum karenge to wo hat jayega. Baki sir September mahine mein mujhe lagta hai call jyada aayega us mahine bahut jyada call aayi hai usme naukri ke jyada call aayi hogi. Baki.
Customer: Haan haan wahi wahi wahi keh raha hu.
Executive: Haan October mahine mein fir se call normal ho gayi 15 18. Baki sir thoda sa ghat acha hai September ke comparison mein kam hai but hai.
Customer: Thoda sa ghat acha hai.
Executive: Haan main sir ho sakta hai ki kuch reason sir raha hoga uska reason ek baar find out karna padega but till the time hash one press kijiye aur mujhe report kijiye aur sir system se buylead dekhiye kabhi kabhi kya hota hai na kabhi kabhi lead aapke profile par aati hai lekin aapko na usme nahi dikhte to all India wala add dekh kijiye lead.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kyunki ek bhi deal agar aapke mil gayi to ho jayega kam sir abhi kaise chal raha hai IndiaMART sir abhi overall.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Average average response aa raha hai sir ya fir acha response aa raha hai ya kharab response aa raha hai abhi.
Customer: Abhi to average hi ka main kahunga ki koi benefit leads mile to fir batao. Abhi kuch kuch leads consume kiye do char din mein baki dekhte hain us pe ek baar go through karke.
Executive: Sir bilkul wahi hai ki lead nahi use karna hi to slow deta hai sir customer to hum yahi recommend karenge ki dheere dheere lead ko use kijiye AI best platform hai lead jyada use karenge to maine aapko lag raha hai ki retail ke lead hai lekin mere product ke lead theek hai aap uske use kijiye so that uske bulk lead bhi aaye to aapko mile turant. Agar aap system ko yahi nahi pata mujhe kis product lead chahiye to fir wo system aapko bataye ki sir kaise payega aur rating par focus kijiye sir aath logon ne aapko keval rate kiya abhi tak 4.3 ki rating hai to jitne jyada logon se aap rating mange char parameter rating li jati hai response aapka kaisa hai quality kaisi hai delivery kaisa hai behavior kaisa hai man lijiye aapki deal nahi hui but response to aapne acha diya us par aap ek mangiye panch highest rating hoti hai ek lowest to do month ke liye agar aap rating par kaam karenge 40 se jyada rate honge to aap samne se bol sakte ho buyer ko theek hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir baki main aapka concern ban kar raha hu sir aur ek minute hold kijiye ga sir main aapke profile se ek aapko recommend karna chah raha tha isme line par rahiye. Isme sir thoda sa ek aapke profile par ek product hai aapka jisse aapne sabse jyada buylead le rakhi hai three three fabric sheet to three fabric sheet mein aap sir har type ke three fabric sheet mein deal karte hain ya kuch aisa particular hai ki aluminium ka hona chahiye ya uska hona chahiye aisa kuch hai kya aapka?
Customer: Steel ka steel ka hai.
Executive: Steel ka isme bhi aap kaam karte hain sara steel ka karte hain correct. Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai ha wo sir wo bhi ek main team ko mention karai kara dunga jo bhi aap sir dale to aage steel keyword vagaira mention kare taki steel ke jyada aaye.
Customer: Steel iron mainly.
Executive: Haan steel mein sir demand bhi hota hai thoda mahanga rehta hai but steel mein banate to theek thak deal banti hai aapki iska ye aapka hoga maximum hai aur baki sir use karte rahiye rating badhaiye jo bhi aapki problem aati hai sir kuch bhi dikkat aati hai bataye sir aapka main aapko report karunga uske regarding.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir ek baar feedback please de dijiyega sir satisfy karne ke liye taki main aur aapke liye kaam kar paun. Theek hai thank you sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving beneficial leads.

- Receiving fake leads related to jobs.

- Leads are for small area, need 5000 sqft.



Resolution:

- Suggested using bulk filter for quantity.

- Fixed the issue of job-related leads.

- Suggested pressing hash and one to block calls.

- Suggested reporting such calls on WhatsApp.

- Suggested using leads and focusing on ratings.

- Will mention steel keyword in profile.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to report job-related calls on WhatsApp.

- Customer to press hash and one to block calls.

- Customer to focus on increasing ratings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, spam calls, ratings, profile, jobs
